Package app.core.controller

Class ImportManageCenterDataController

java.lang.Object
app.core.controller.ImportManageCenterDataController
public class ImportManageCenterDataController extends Object
Class responsible for coordinating and distributing the actions performed on the ImportManageCenterDataUI.
Author:
Group 40
